price: Сиз уларга хафа бўлманг. Улар қилаётган найранглардан сиқилманг.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
